mapper.select: select * from insurance_rebate_ratio where rebate_ratio_type = #{type} and uid = #{uid} create_time like concat(DATE_FORMAT(#{zbTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),"%")

select * from insurance_rebate_ratio where rebate_ratio_type = #{type} and usage_type = #{usageType} and uid = #{uid} and uid = #{uid} and create_time like concat(DATE_FORMAT(#{zbTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),"%")

select * from insurance_rebate_ratio where rebate_ratio_type = #{type} and usage_type = #{usageType} and car_damage_insured = 0 and third_party_insured_start = #{thirdPartyInsuredStart} and third_party_insured_end = #{thirdPartyInsuredEnd} and uid = #{uid} and create_time like concat(DATE_FORMAT(#{zbTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),"%")
select * from insurance_rebate_ratio where rebate_ratio_type = #{type} and usage_type = #{usageType} and car_damage_insured != 0 and create_time like concat(DATE_FORMAT(#{zbTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),"%")

select * from insurance_rebate_ratio where rebate_ratio_type = #{type} and usage_type = #{usageType} and uid =#{uid} and car_damage_insured = 0 and create_time like concat(DATE_FORMAT(#{zbTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),"%")

select * from insurance_rebate_ratio where rebate_ratio_type = #{type} and usage_type = #{usageType} and car_damage_insured != 0 and third_party_insured_start = #{thirdPartyInsuredStart} and third_party_insured_end = #{thirdPartyInsuredEnd} and uid = #{uid} and create_time like concat(DATE_FORMAT(#{zbTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),"%")
select * from insurance_rebate_ratio where rebate_ratio_type = #{type} and usage_type = #{usageType} and car_damage_insured != 0 and create_time like concat(DATE_FORMAT(#{zbTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),"%")
select * from insurance_rebate_ratio where usage_type = #{usageType} and rebate_ratio_type = #{rebateRatioType}

select * from insurance_rebate_ratio where usage_type = #{usageType} and rebate_ratio_type = #{rebateRatioType} and third_party_insured_start = #{thirdPartyInsuredStart} and third_party_insured_end = #{thirdPartyInsuredEnd} and car_damage_insured=#{carDamageInsured} and create_time like concat(DATE_FORMAT(#{zbTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),"%")
select * from insurance_rebate_ratio where usage_type = #{usageType} and rebate_ratio_type = #{rebateRatioType} and uid=#{uid} and create_time like concat(DATE_FORMAT(#{zbTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),"%")
